title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: James Cameron returns to the world of Pandora. Set a decade plus after events of the first film, this breathtaking new movie tells the story of the Sully family and introduces audiences to the majestic ocean tulkun.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: When Peter Parker's secret identity is discovered, he turns to Doctor Strange to make the world forget that he is Spider-Man.

title: Barbie
description: Living in Barbie Land is about being a perfect being in a perfect place. Unless you have a total existential crisis. Or you are a Ken.

title: War for the Planet of the Apes
description: Caesar and his apes face an army of humans in a battle that will determine the fate of both species and the future of the planet.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
description: Marvel Studios presents its biggest mistake to date. His escapades as Deadpool are in the past, and an apathetic Wade Wilson goes about his day with reluctance.

title: The Batman
description: A murderer threatens Gotham's elite, and Batman sets out to unmask him: he must fit the pieces of the puzzle, forge new alliances, and punish corruption.

title: Kung Fu Panda 4
description: Po and his new ally face a sorceress who wants to take their Staff of Wisdom from them.

title: The Nun
description: When a nun commits suicide, a priest and a novice investigate and discover the secret of the order: a demonic nun who appeared in 'The Conjuring.'

title: Up
description: Two peculiar travel companions head to heaven for the adventure of their lives.

title: The Meg
description: A rescue diver and an oceanographer face a prehistoric shark more than 20 meters long known as the Megalodon.

title: Inception
description: Dom Cobb is a thief who can enter people's dreams and take their secrets.

title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
description: After the destruction of the world, the young Furiosa finds her bones in the Green Place of Many Mothers and falls into the clutches of the Biker Horde.

title: The Fall Guy
description: Colt Seavers, a stuntman, returns to action when a movie star goes missing.

title: Napoleon
description: Napoleon is a spectacle-packed action epic detailing the eventful rise and fall of the iconic French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte.

title: Uncharted
description: Treasure hunter Nathan Drake, a descendent of explorer Sir Francis Drake, learns the whereabouts of El Dorado, the fabled South American golden city.

title: Bullet Train
description: In Bullet Train, Brad Pitt plays Mariquita, a down-on-his-luck assassin determined to carry out his job quietly after several derailed assignments. However, destiny has other plans, Mariquita's latest mission pits him against deadly adversaries from around the world, all with intertwined and competing objectives, on the world's fastest train.

title: Ratatouille
description: In one of Paris' finest restaurants, Remy, a determined young rat, dreams of becoming a renowned French chef.

title: Toy Story 4
description: Woody has always known his priority is to take care of his child, whether it be Andy or Bonnie. But when Bonnie brings a reluctant new toy named Forky into her room, an exciting adventure begins.

title: Dunkirk
description: During the Second World War, British and Allied troops find themselves surrounded by enemy forces on the beach with their backs to the sea, facing a tough battle.

title: Oppenheimer
description: Experience the global phenomenon that has captivated audiences, immersing them in the mind of physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his work on the Manhattan Project.

title: Jumanji: The Next Level
description: Return to the game with the whole gang in Jumanji: The Next Level. When the friends return to rescue Spencer, they discover that the game has changed.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
description: Bohemian Rhapsody is a celebration of Queen, their music, and their singer Freddie Mercury, who defied stereotypes and became one of the most beloved artists in history.

title: The Hunger Games: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes
description: The story follows a young Coriolanus Snow, the last hope for the once-proud Snow family, as he mentors Lucy Gray Baird, a Tribute from District 12, in the 10th Hunger Games.

title: Coco
description: Miguel, a young aspiring musician, accidentally arrives in the Land of the Dead, where he discovers his true musical heritage.

title: Incredibles 2
description: Helen is brought in to help re-legalize supers, while Bob leads a 'normal' life at home. A dangerous new villain appears, and only the Incredibles can defeat him together.

title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
description: With a volcano threatening to destroy Isla Nublar, two former Jurassic World employees race to save the surviving dinosaurs.

title: Cars 3
description: Surprised by a new generation of racers, Lightning McQueen finds himself separated from the sport he loves. To compete again, she will need the help of young coach Cruz RamÃ­rez.

title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
description: When their late police captain is linked to drug cartels, Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.
